thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Promsvyazbank capital reduced to 1 rouble - Central Bank Of Russia

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Promsvyazbank capital reduced to 1 rouble - Central Bank Of Russia
text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - CENTRAL BANK OF RUSSIA:
* SAYS CAPITAL OF PROMSVYAZBANK HAS BEEN WRITTEN DOWN TO 1 ROUBLE
* THE PROCEDURE OF REDUCING CAPITAL IS PART OF THE FINANCIAL RECOVERY PROCESS
* AFTER THE WRITE-DOWN, THE BANK WILL BE RECAPITALIZED AND THE CBRâ€˜S BANKING SECTOR CONSOLIDATION FUND WILL BECOME ITS SHAREHOLDER
Source text: bit.ly/2B1lGT3
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
